title: Trump flips off 'lunatic' heckler at Ford plant in Detroit
shortDescription: A cell phone video shows Trump flipping off a heckler at a Ford facility in what the White House says was 'an appropriate' response

title: When will Trump Mobile deliver T1 cellphone? See the new date.
shortDescription: The wireless phone company bearing the president's name pushed back the delivery date for its T1 phone. It has done so multiple times.

title: Trump highlights manufacturing during visit to Ford factory
shortDescription: President Trump visited the factory floor of a Ford plant in Dearborn on Jan. 13, where he defended his sweeping tariffs.

title: Trump to halt funds for sanctuary cities
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a plan to stop payments to sanctuary cities and states starting February 1.

title: Donald Trump's estranged niece, Mary, reveals she's newly married
shortDescription: Mary Trump in a Substack post said she got married in a private ceremony last October.

title: Trump says he will 'act accordingly' on Iran
shortDescription: President Trump says he will "act accordingly" on Iran after receiving accurate death toll numbers.

title: Trump says he's withholding funds from sanctuary cities and states
shortDescription: President Trump said his administration starting Feb. 1 will withhold federal funds from sanctuary cities and states that have sanctuary cities.

title: When will Americans get the $2,000 tariff checks? Trump's latest answer
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has floated sending $2,000 checks for the tariff revenue under his new policies. When might it happen? See what he said.

title: Trump says he'll unveil framework to lower health care costs soon
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said during a speech in Detroit that his administration will unveil a framework for lowering health care costs later this week.

title: 'Real losers': Trump rips GOP senators over Venezuela strike vote
shortDescription: President Donald Trump tore into Republicans who moved to keep him from striking Venezuela again without congressional approval while in Detroit.

title: New poll reveals voters' sentiments on ICE shooting. See results.
shortDescription: The national poll was conducted days after an ICE agent fatally shot Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis, sparking outrage and mass protests.

title: Trump to unveil plan to lower health care costs
shortDescription: President Donald Trumps said his administration will soon unveil the framework to lower health care costs.

title: Tony Dokoupil, Trump interview set to air Tuesday night
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to be interviewed by newly minted CBS News host Tony Dokoupil on Tuesday, Jan. 13.

title: Trump's US attorney behind Minnesota fraud probe resigns
shortDescription: Joe Thompson was the acting U.S. Attorney of Minnesota appointed by President Donald Trump who helped uncover massive fraud in the state.

title: Trump opens door for migrants to be deported back to Somalia
shortDescription: The Trump administration decried Democratic leaders in Minnesota and said a "DAY OF RECKONING" was coming.

title: Clintons refuse to testify before Congress in Epstein probe
shortDescription: A letter from Bill and Hillary Clinton's lawyers argues congressional subpoenas attempting to compel them to testify are "invalid."

title: Trump to Iranian protesters: 'HELP IS ON ITS WAY'
shortDescription: Demonstrations in Iran began in December when the value of the Iranian rial plunged against the US dollar and people took to the streets in Tehran.

title: Trump warns nations over Iran trade amid protests
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatens 25% tariffs and possible military action amid Iran's deadly protests and internet blackout.

shortDescription: In the aftermath of recent U.S. military action in Venezuela, Trump is considering targeting even more countries, including Greenland, Iran and Cuba.
